item.description:
Bring a bag lunch and join us for a day of Japanese cars and motorcycles at Larz Anderson Auto Museum, followed by a group scoot for Ice Cream in Carlisle.

Here's the link to the event: LINK
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Big Red Scooter with the meetup sign on it. Park your bike on the edge of the road inside the gate to the left with the other bikes. Plan to arrive at 10 Sharp for best parking - I'd like us to be all together if possible.
item.name: Auto Museum Picnic & Ice Cream Run
